name: bnj1538
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
-| wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
